# Hold Person, Mass (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] ([[Compulsion Spells|compulsion]]) \[[[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level: [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]]**, [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F/DF (a small, straight piece of iron)

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Targets:** One one or more humanoid creatures, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D); see text

**Saving Throw:** Will negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 296

This spell functions like *[[Hold Person (Spell)|hold person]]**,* except as noted above.
